translations: 连续猛击（buffet 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Their plane had been severely buffeted by storms.
sentences.translation: 他们的飞机遭到了暴风雨的猛烈袭击。

sentences.sentence: The nation had been buffeted by a wave of strikes.
sentences.translation: 罢工浪潮使这个国家受到了重创。

sentences.sentence: So uproariously gay was the dance, and how they buffeted each other on the bed and out of it!
sentences.translation: 舞蹈是多么有趣快乐啊，他们在床上和床外互相打闹得多么厉害啊！
